message: Let's be reasonable, Bob.  This gives you a decent share upfront.
Alice, my turn. I understand you want a larger share, but I need to look out for myself with this inflation.  This offer is more balanced.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Take this offer before the inflation eats away at your share even more!
Alice, let's be realistic. This offer gives us both a reasonable share considering the inflation. If we wait any longer, the deal will only get worse for both of us.
